value.name: SoCal Legends: John Young
value.description: John Young was a major league baseball player and scout, but has built a lasting legacy by creating the RBI program for underprivileged youth.

value.name: Funeral notice: John Young, 67
value.description: John Young, 67, Hillsboro, N.C., died Friday, Dec. 4, in UNC Hospice. A memorial service will be 2 p.m. June 12, at Oakwood Cemetery in Austin, Minn. Military honors will be provided by Hayfield American Legion Rothie Post #330.

value.name: Palm Beach Society: Police and Fire Foundation supporters venture outdoors for golf classic
value.description: The Palm Beach Police & Fire Foundation's annual Golf Classic at Trump International was its first in-person event since the pandemic hit.

value.name: The new Police and Crime Commissioners elected in Wales
value.description: Liberal Democrats and independent candidate Mark John Young. He won with 98,034 overall votes defeating Conservative rival Pat Astbury by 7,885 votes after second preference ballots were added in.
